name: 3D Student Platformer
description:
I am a first year game design student at the University of the Sunshine Coast. This assessment was for a class called Introduction to Programming. Using elements provided by Unreal Engine in their "Hour of Code" exercise, I programmed this game in Unreal and Visual Studio using C++ and Blueprints.

Extension activities included:

 -Double Jump

-Controller Compatibility

 -Sprint

 -Poison Objects

 -Level Design

 -Particle Effects

 -Sound Effects
